text: Brigadier John Wright (10 October 1940 – 4 May 2016) was a British Army officer and polo administrator. Wright was born in Peshawar, British India (now Pakistan), the son of Thomas Wright, a colonel in the British Army, serving in India. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Royal Tank Regiment officers Category:16th/5th The Queen's Royal Lancers officers Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire
title: John Wright (British Army officer)
